import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; import useInput from "../hooks/useInput"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./styles/Home.css"; const CreateUser = () => { const name = useInput(); const email = useInput(); const password = useInput(); const handleSumbit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("/api/newuser", { name: name.value, email: email.value, password: password.value, }) .then(() => alert("Usuario creado con exito: BIENVENIDO!")); }; return (
); }; export default CreateUser; /*
*/
